TopicTitle: No video on 64 bit Ubuntu with ATI 4xxx graphics cards.

Articles.Content:
Versions: extant since at least .23 see bug #2069 in tracker. Tracker password recovery is also broken, which is why I'm here.

OS is 64 bit Ubuntu 12.04 (it works fine in 32 bit).

My graphics card is a Radeon 4550, bug mentioned above confirms it happens with other 4xxx ATI cards. Possibly all ATI cards using the legacy drivers.

To duplicate: start game on a 64 bit linux installation with a 4xxx or earlier graphics card.
